org.unc.lac.baboon.aspect

Interface JoinPointObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HappeningControllerSynchronizer

    public interface JoinPointObserver
    Observer Interface. The classes implementing this interface can be subscribed to HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter. This way, the observer gets an update if a HappeningController annotated method is about to be executed or if its execution just finished.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  JoinPointObserver.State
      This enum represent the state of the execution of the HappeningController annotated method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(java.lang.Object target, java.lang.String methodName, JoinPointObserver.State state)
      This method is called when a HappeningController method is about to be executed or when a HappeningController method execution just finished.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(java.lang.Object target,
            java.lang.String methodName,
            JoinPointObserver.State state)
        This method is called when a HappeningController method is about to be executed or when a HappeningController method execution just finished.
        Parameters:
        target - The instance of the object invoking the HappeningController annotated method.
        methodName - The name of the HappeningController annotated method.
        state - The JoinPointObserver.State of the execution of the HappeningController annotated method.
